title.rendered: New Walls of Books Training Center

content.rendered: The training center and corporate headquarters for the Walls of Books franchise is nearly complete!  This new facility will house all primary operations for the Walls of Books system.  Call us to schedule a visit, and explore all the opportunities available with the Walls of Books franchise system.  It’s never been a better time to open a bookstore franchise!

excerpt.rendered: The training center and corporate headquarters for the Walls of Books franchise is nearly complete!  This new facility will house all primary operations for the Walls of Books system.  Call us to schedule a visit, and explore all the opportunities available with the Walls of Books franchise system.  It’s never been a better time to open a bookstore franchise!
